Package com.lyit.csd.marketapi.yahoo

Class YahooClient

java.lang.Object
com.lyit.csd.marketapi.yahoo.YahooClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
MarketClient
public class YahooClient extends Object implements MarketClient
YahooClient class implements MarketClient interface to retrieve data from Yahoo Finance API.
